pageTitle: In the last 12 weeks, have you lived abroad with a family member who was posted there with the armed forces?
heading: In the last 12 weeks, have you lived abroad with a family member who was posted there with the armed forces?
hint: This helps us to understand any gaps in your UK National Insurance record.

errors.required: Select yes if you have lived abroad with a family member in the armed forces in the last 12 weeks
